exceed.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to be more than a particular number or amount
exceed.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Working hours must not exceed 42 hours a week.
exceed.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to go beyond what rules or laws say you are allowed to do
exceed.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He was fined for exceeding the speed limit.
The riot police had exceeded their authority.
exceed.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to be more than a particular number or amount
exceed.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Working hours must not exceed 42 hours a week.
exceed.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to go beyond an official or legal limit
exceed.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Pesticide levels must not exceed the limit set by the EU.
